B

barrier_btn - Static variable in class main.MainActivity
 
Border - Class in components
This is the class that creates the borders of the grid, it does not inherit from the JavaFX Button class but each object is linked to one
Border(int, int, char) - Constructor for class components.Border
 
borderClicked(int, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class components.Plateau
It takes as parameters the x and y of the border that is considered and a boolean if it is vertical and a boolean to see if clicked or not it sets the two boxes that are around the considered border (using the isVertical variable) as clicked or not
BorderList - Class in components
This is the class that creates the list of borders of the game It is created twice, for horizontal and vertical borders as static variables in the MainActivity
BorderList(int, int, char) - Constructor for class components.BorderList
Its the constructor of the BorderList class it takes in as parameters the number of rows and columns of the two dimensional table of Borders and a character to set which rotation, vertical or horizontal It then creates the table accordingly
Box - Class in components
This is the class that creates the cells of the grid, it does not inherit from the JavaFX Button class but each object is linked to one
Box(int, int) - Constructor for class components.Box
